ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue
ygData.msgSnippet: Back in August or so they patched so that Bards got magic attacks from magic gloves like monks because we use hand to hand so much.  I wish they d raise our
ygData.messageBody:
Back in August or so they patched so that Bards got magic attacks from magic
gloves like monks because we use hand to hand so much. I wish they'd raise
our H2H cap as well. I'd much rather have a 200 skill in H2H than in say...
1hb with as often as I use all instruments.

Last night my group was camping the frenzy so some of our warriors could get
a sash (I've had mine since 37th) and all we had for healing was a druid. I
went all-instrument (HoR, Celerity, Largos, CoD) Lute only (didn't feel like
bouncing instruments around and we had 4 melee'ers so celerity was better
than another DOT)

With that combination our druid had to heal 1 maybe 2 times during any given
fight even the BT's weren't bad.

Bards use H2H second only to Monks. I really wish Verant would raise our
skill cap in it. I capped H2H LONG before I capped 1hs/pierce/1hb in any
given level after 18th.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 12:40 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue


> > From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
>
> > Wisps are magic only to hit, but in a an all song
> > attack, that's not
> > a problem. (try to pick up magic gloves though so you can
> > punch the wisps)
>
> Err, you're talking like mesh gloves right? I thought only monks could
use
> those as magic attacks and that for the rest of us they were just a light
> weight glove. Am I wrong?
>
> Peace,
> Evulia, who gave her mesh gloves to her monk not too long ago...
>
